name: REGENESIS Arcade DELUXE
detailed_description:
REGENESIS Arcade DELUXE is a VR physics-based arcade shooter with a futuristic setting.
Players use various weapons including a gravity gun to destroy enemies and manipulate objects in their environment.
Awakening from a long period of hibernation, you discover a world ruled by different robot fractions. Each will try to use you for their own goals, from protecting you as probably the last human on earth, or trying to kill you...

Game features:

- demanding Action Arcade mode, with never-ending waves of enemies
- Unique weapons, including a physics-based gravity gun
- Several enemy types with different AI and special abilities
- Cool companion robot to make sure you don’t feel lonely
- Full support for the HTC Vive & Oculus Touch

DELUXE version includes more features especially in ARCADE mode:
More enemies including variations of small RECON SPIDERS
8 powerups (including TURRET SUPPORT)
6 arcade maps
3 types of turrets (GATLING, PLASMA and ROCKET TURRET)
26 weapon perks to unlock
Global ranking and leaderboards

and even much more will come in future updates...

Few words about us:
Hyperbook Studio is the independent software department of the Polish Hyperbook Studio company, which produces top-tier computers and some of the most powerful and efficient notebooks for business and entertainment. REGENESIS Arcade is our debut VR experience. Hyperbook Studio uses Hyperbook high performance technologies to create the best VR applications.

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR

short_description: REGENESIS Arcade DELUXE is a VR physics-based arcade shooter in futuristic setting. Players use various weapons including a gravity gun to destroy enemies and manipulate objects in their environment.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“REGENESIS Arcade is an incredibly addictive game. Shooting for aggressive drones provides great fun”
PIXEL Magazine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i7-6700 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:
